title: Finway - Sync any e-commerce and accounting software

hero.title: The best way to manage your e-commerce orders and invoices.
hero.subTitle: Software does the work for you, auto sync all orders and invoices from any e-commerce platform in one click. Let software do the work.

features.title: Auto sync all orders and invoices.
features.subTitle: Reduce errors, save time and money with one click e-commerce sync.

feat.title: Auto Sync Orders & Invoices.
feat.subTitle: Finway is a simple way to keep your e-commerce store and accounting platform in sync automatically.

feat.title: Reduce Data Entry Errors & Save Time.
feat.subTitle: You'll be able to spend more time selling products rather than entering data into multiple platforms by hand.

centerCard.title: Auto sync for e-commerce and accounting platforms.
centerCard.subTitle: We're a fully automated order and invoice tracking system, that allows you to automatically synchronize all orders from any e-commerce platform or accounting software with your preferred ERP or accounting package.

compatibility.title: Compatibility
compatibility.subTitle: This is what we support right now. Out of the box. Using a different software suite? Let us know! We'll hook it up.

process.title: One click accounting.
process.subTitle: Auto sync all orders and invoices from any e-commerce and accounting platform in one click. Let software do the work.

steps.title: Connect your accounts.
steps.subTitle: Choose from a wide range of supported platforms, or connect via API to get up and running in minutes.

steps.title: Set it up once, then forget about it.
steps.subTitle: Finway automatically syncs every order and invoice across your platforms so you can focus on growing your business instead of chasing paperwork around the office or home desktops.

steps.title: Profit!
steps.subTitle: You'll spend less time doing paperwork - more time growing sales, creating new products, innovating customer service or whatever else gets you excited about being an entrepreneur!

pricing.title: Free yourself from time-consuming tasks.
pricing.subTitle: Finway automates tedious accounting and e-commerce workflows so you can focus on the most important thing - your business. Try it for free with our 30-day trial offer.

cards.title: Start
features: Automatically sync webshop order with your accounting software as invoices
Shipping Fee's based on webshop order data

cards.title: Pro
features: Automatically sync webshop order with your accounting software as invoices
Shipping Fee's based on webshop order data
Realtime insight into supplier stock (intake required)

cards.title: Business
features: Automatically sync webshop order with your accounting software as invoices
Shipping Fee's based on webshop order data
Realtime insight into supplier stock (intake required)
Purchase orders at your supplier directly from Finway
Dropship your orders to your customers
Smart email parser to read supplier emails and find Track & Trace links or delivered items
